name: A flamehardened greatcloak
data: It decreases the users strength adequately.
It decreases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users wisdom divinely.
It increases the users intelligence divinely.
It has low armour class for its type (decent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration divinely.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users fire resistance superbly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
